As talon flew up, he quickly caught up with Legacy, who was himself
flying much slower as he was carrying Rodimus. As Talon got closer he
could hear last bit of the conversation Legacy was having with Cheetor
via radio. Cheetor was saying, "I don't know, I don't trust those
Predacons, they've fooled us before."

"I don't trust those Predacons at all!" Ramulus quipped, also over the radio.

"You don't trust anyone Ramulus!" Cheetor said, half jokingly

"You are correct." Legacy replied via radio, cutting into thier side
conversation, "However so far Perceptor has proven loyal in this
respect."

Cheetor sighed, "Okay, I gotcha. Give the bot rope to hang himself with."

> Tucson sends out a sonar wave, and quickly finds the hook with his hand, wrapping around his arms securely. He looks down to the others.
> " All right, I have the cable. Can you pull more than just one of us up at a time? If not, I'll wait until the others are up there safely."

As Talon got to the top he could see Cheetor standing at the top of
the pit, with Airhammer in his strange Hammerhead Shark-Hawk beast
mode hovering watchfully in the air, he seemed agitated.

Ramulus was standing at the edge of the pit, the rope that was
dangling down had been shot from Ramulus' forearm, and that he was
standing braced to pull others to saftety.

Legacy, on the other hand had not slowed in his flight as he rose
higher into the air, taking Rodimus in the direction of the Ark,

"Maybe I could get two or three if I could get some help here."
Ramulus griped as he glanced meaningfully at Talon, Cheetor and
Airhammer!

(TAG)

Preston
